page.title: 04A WORKING DAY IN RADCLIFFE
page.content: THE ADULT RISES AT 7 a.m.,THE CHILD AT 7.15 a.m.,TO WATCH POPEYE ON BREAKFAST T.V. THEY BREAKFAST ON CEREALS, TOAST AND TEA. AT 8.15 a.m.THE ADULT DRIVES THE CHILD TO SCHOOL AND CONTINUES TO THE HEALTH CENTRE TO WORK. THE CHILD BEGINS SCHOOL WITH MATHS (NO HOMEWORK),THEN GEOGRAPHY WITH LOTS (UGH!).THE ADULT IS BUSY WITH PAPER WORK. SCHOOL DINNERS IS FOLLOWED BY PLAY AND HOMEWORK (12-1.10p.m.)WHILE THE ADULT HAS A SALAD BARMCAKE AND COFFEE, INTERRUPTED BY PHONE-CALLS. DURING THE WET AFTERNOON THE ADULT TAKES A LADY TO HOSPITAL, THE CHILD PLAYS INDOOR CRICKET AND READS IN ENGLISH,THE CHILD,HOME AT 4p.m., WATCHES A VIDEO, ADULT RETURNS AT 5.30p.m.THEY HAVE TEA,THEN HOMEWORK AND BED AT 9.30(CHILD),10.30(ADULT).
